title: NieR:Automata Free Download Direct Link
description:
NieR Automata is a cool RPG in which you will fight aliens as a cool, effeminate robot sent by humans to Earth to reclaim it The game takes place many hundreds of years after the original game. The war with aliens was never won, and in the end people were forced to leave Earth and move to the Moon. But no matter how it was, the desire to return back people has not left, and that is why they continue to send detachments of fighters to Earth.
But now, instead of people, robots are sent to the planet, humanoid droids, one of which you will control. As for the gameplay of NieR Automata, it is primarily based on fast dynamic battles with numerous alien technologies and armies. Everything happens in the style of a slasher: you will deliver fast lightning attacks, jump over the heads of the enemy and, in the process of somersault, hit them over their heads, dodge attacks, roll on the ground and do much more.

system_requirements.Processor: Intel Core i3 2100 or AMD A8-6500
system_requirements.Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 770 VRAM 2GB or AMD Radeon R9 270X VRAM 2GB

game_info.Version: v1.0.1787043 (Game of the YoRHa Edition) | Updated  + All DLC
